"Akatsuki": "The request I have for you is a sweep-up operation in Dreisen Plant."
"That place contains rather troublesome enemies known as \"Scout Wasps\"."
"When you get spotted by them, they end up summoning defensive \"Beehive E\" structures."
"Unexpected reinforcements like that can instantly spell the downfall of an entire squad."
"Which is why I'd like to reduce their numbers as much as possible."
"I'd like to ask that you go out and defeat these Scout Wasps."
"Standard procedure is to quickly destroy them before they can call for reinforcements."
"I look forward to what sort of results you'll produce."
